-1045.message: Failed: Recipient postal address could not be extracted from the document
-1045.detail: Verify that the address is correctly positioned.

-910.detail: Letter is being processed. Processing may take a few hours.

-3146.message: Specified pre-uploaded document does not exist
-3146.detail: The specified template does not exist or the user does not have permissions to use it.

-3145.detail: The XML must not contain a field that does not appear in the template. Read more.

-3147.message: Uploading a file and a template in the same request is not allowed
-3147.detail: It is not possible to upload a file and refer to a template in the same request. Please check the syntax of FileExtension in your code.

-3142.detail: The file specified for the image side cannot be used as a template.

-3143.message: Address side: This file cannot be used as a template

-995.detail: Letter was processed and is waiting to be dispatched to the postal agency. This may take up to one business day.

-990.detail: Attention Needed. The account does not have enough funds to process the letter. If additional funds are added in the Account section of the Control Panel within 72 hours, the letter will continue being processed immediately thereafter.

-900.detail: Letter was received and queued for processing

-1065.detail: The letter contains more sheets of paper than may be inserted into the selected envelope. For example, a No. 10 envelope may hold up to 7 sheets of paper.

-3160.detail: The file name specified does not exist. Make sure you are using the <file name>.<file extension> format.

-3020.message: Rejected: file specified is currently unavailable
-3020.detail: The requested PDF is currently unavailable. Possible causes: (1) file is still being processed, (2) file was deleted due to enhanced privacy settings, (3) file was deleted due to age limitations.

-3162.detail: This account has reached its file quota. Check the System Limitations page.

-3022.message: Cancellation Denied: The letter was physically processed and cannot be cancelled or is already cancelled
-3022.detail: It is not possible to cancel the letter delivery because the letter was already processed and queued for delivery to the postal agency or it may have been cancelled already.

-4014.message: The MergeData field is empty or missing
-4014.detail: MergeData is a required field. MergeData should contain the XML or binary representation of the XML to be used as the merge data source. Please make sure that you did not send a null string. If it is missing, the problem might be caused by the SOAP package you use. Contact technical support for further assistance.

-3117.message: Rejected: Company field contains more than 45 characters
-3117.detail: The company property is limited to 45 characters.

-4013.detail: ID field should be either an integer, a range of integers (e.g., 1021984-1021994) or a list of comma separated integers (e.g., 1021984,1021985,1021986).

-3116.message: Warning: the specified letter is unavailable
-3116.detail: The specified item ID does not exist in the system.

-4010.message: The MinID field is empty or missing
-4010.detail: MinID is a required field. MinID should contain the ID of the first letter in the range you querying about. Please make sure that you did not send a null string. If it is missing, the problem might be caused by the SOAP package you use. Contact technical support for further assistance.

-3119.message: Rejected: Address2 field contains more than 45 characters
-3119.detail: Field Address2 is limited to 45 characters.

-4011.message: The MaxID field is empty or missing
-4011.detail: MaxID is a required field. MaxID should contain the ID of the last letter in the range you are querying about. Please make sure that you did not send a null string. If it is missing, the problem might be caused by the SOAP package you use. Contact technical support for further assistance.

-3118.message: Rejected: Address1 field contains more than 45 characters
-3118.detail: Field Address1 is limited to 45 characters.

-1002.message: Completed: successfully completed in "Development" work mode
-1002.detail: Letter handling is complete, but the letter will not be physically processed or delivered to the postal agency.

-3113.message: Rejected: city field contains more than 30 characters

-3010.detail: Your account does not have the necessary balance to process your letter. Check your balance and purchase a new prepaid card.

-1010.detail: Account does not have sufficient funds to process the letter.

-3132.message: The ImageSideBinaryData field is empty or missing
-3132.detail: ImageSideBinaryData must contain your document or image as BASE64 binary data. Please make sure that you did not send a null string. If it is missing, the problem might be caused by the SOAP package you use. Please post your code on our forum for further assistance.

-3133.message: The AddressSideBinaryData field is empty or missing
-3133.detail: AddressSideBinaryData must contain your document or image as BASE64 binary data. Please make sure that you did not send a null string. If it is missing, the problem might be caused by the SOAP package you use. Please post your code on our forum for further assistance.

-3134.message: File name provided in ImageSideFileType does not exist for this user
-3134.detail: The provided file name does not exist for this user. The file name may be inaccurate or it may have been deleted.

-3135.message: File name provided in AddressSideFileType does not exist for this user
-3135.detail: The provided file name does not exist for this user. The file name may be inaccurate or it may have been deleted.

-1025.message: Failed: A document could not be processed
-1025.detail: Make sure your documents contain no macros. Verify that you can view your document locally. If the document appears OK, contact technical support.

-3136.message: Image side: One or more of the fields is missing from the template
-3136.detail: One or more of the merge fields provided for the image side does not correspond to a place holder in the template specified.

-3137.detail: One or more of the merge fields provided for the address side does not correspond to a place holder in the template specified.

-4001.detail: Username is a required field. Please make sure that you did not send a null string. If it is missing, the problem might be caused by the SOAP package you're using. Contact technical support for further assistance.

-4002.detail: Password is a required field. Please make sure that you did not send a null string. If it is missing, the problem might be caused by the SOAP package you use. Contact technical support for further assistance.
